titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jorge Rojas Gutierrez, Olivia Gonzalez Gonzalez, and Jorge Rojas Gonzalez.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1133-1134)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/2/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Jorge Rojas Gutierrez, Olivia Gonzalez Gonzalez, and Jorge Rojas Gonzalez.
